content: That's a great overview of the benefits and design elements to consider for a patio and garden. I'll definitely keep those tips in mind as I continue to work on my outdoor space. Since I've recently rented out my old farmhouse, I'm thinking about how I can make my new farmhouse more attractive to potential renters or buyers in the future. Do you have any advice on how to stage a farmhouse to make it more appealing to renters or buyers? Are there any specific features or design elements that are particularly attractive to people looking for a rural retreat?
